pullrequest.title: Model editor's new joint maker interface

content.raw:
Thanks for the feedback. I'd like to hold off for now on adding text for joint creation. We'll do some user tests a little later on, and I'm curious to see how long it takes people to figure it out. 

For the rotation, that sounds like a good idea. I'll need to have a look at it to make sure I understand correctly.
content.html:
Thanks for the feedback. I'd like to hold off for now on adding text for joint creation. We'll do some user tests a little later on, and I'm curious to see how long it takes people to figure it out.

For the rotation, that sounds like a good idea. I'll need to have a look at it to make sure I understand correctly.
